${modId}.configuration.title: Shoulder Surfing Reloaded Client Configuration
${modId}.configuration.camera.keep_camer: Keep camera out of head distance multiplier
The distance multiplier on whether or not to hide the player model if the camera gets too close to it. Set to 0 to disable.
${modId}.configuration.camera.camera_ste: Size of the camera adjustment per step.
${modId}.configuration.camera.camera_tra: The speed multiplier at which the camera transitions between positions.
${modId}.configuration.camera.center_cam: Center camera when looking down angle
The angle at which the camera will be centered when looking down. Set to 0 to disable.
${modId}.configuration.camera.dynamicall: Whether or not to dynamically adjust camera offsets depending on space constraints.
${modId}.configuration.camera.decoupled_: Whether or not to decouple the camera rotation from the player rotation.
${modId}.configuration.offset.min.min_of: When x-offset is limited this is the minimum amount.
When y-offset is limited this is the minimum amount.
When z-offset is limited this is the minimum amount.
${modId}.configuration.offset.max.max_of: When x-offset is limited this is the maximum amount.
When y-offset is limited this is the maximum amount.
When z-offset is limited this is the maximum amount.
${modId}.configuration.offset.limits.unl: Whether or not x-offset adjustment has limits.
Whether or not y-offset adjustment has limits.
Whether or not z-offset adjustment has limits.
${modId}.configuration.offset.multiplier: Passenger x-offset multiplier
x-offset multiplier for when the player is a passenger.
Passenger y-offset multiplier
y-offset multiplier for when the player is a passenger.
Passenger z-offset multiplier
z-offset multiplier for when the player is a passenger.
Sprint x-offset multiplier
x-offset multiplier for when the player is sprinting.
Sprint y-offset multiplier
y-offset multiplier for when the player is sprinting.
Sprint z-offset multiplier
z-offset multiplier for when the player is sprinting.
Aiming x-offset multiplier
x-offset multiplier for when the player is aiming.
Aiming y-offset multiplier
y-offset multiplier for when the player is aiming.
Aiming z-offset multiplier
z-offset multiplier for when the player is aiming.
Elytra x-offset multiplier
x-offset multiplier for when using Elytra.
Elytra y-offset multiplier
y-offset multiplier for when using Elytra.
Elytra z-offset multiplier
z-offset multiplier for when using Elytra.
Climbing x-offset multiplier
x-offset multiplier for when the player is climbing.
Climbing y-offset multiplier
y-offset multiplier for when the player is climbing.
Climbing z-offset multiplier
z-offset multiplier for when the player is climbing.
${modId}.configuration.offset.modifier.p: x-offset modifier for when the player is a passenger.
y-offset modifier for when the player is a passenger.
z-offset modifier for when the player is a passenger.
${modId}.configuration.offset.modifier.s: x-offset modifier for when the player is sprinting.
y-offset modifier for when the player is sprinting.
z-offset modifier for when the player is sprinting.
${modId}.configuration.offset.modifier.a: x-offset modifier for when the player is aiming.
y-offset modifier for when the player is aiming.
z-offset modifier for when the player is aiming.
${modId}.configuration.offset.modifier.f: x-offset modifier for when using Elytra.
y-offset modifier for when using Elytra.
z-offset modifier for when using Elytra.
${modId}.configuration.offset.modifier.c: x-offset modifier for when the player is climbing.
y-offset modifier for when the player is climbing.
z-offset modifier for when the player is climbing.
${modId}.configuration.perspective.defau: The default perspective when you load the game.
${modId}.configuration.perspective.remem: Whether or not to remember the last perspective used.
${modId}.configuration.perspective.repla: Whether or not to replace the default third person perspective.
${modId}.configuration.perspective.skip_: Whether or not to skip the third person front perspective.
${modId}.configuration.player.adjust_pla: Whether or not to adjust the player model transparency when view is obstructed. Changing this value may require a game restart to take full effect.
${modId}.configuration.player.hide_playe: Center camera when looking up angle
The angle at which the player will no longer be rendered when looking up. Set to 0 to disable.
${modId}.configuration.player.player_x_r: Whether the x-rot of the player should follow the camera x-rot. This config option only applies when camera is decoupled.
${modId}.configuration.player.player_y_r: Whether the y-rot of the player should follow the camera y-rot. This config option only applies when camera is decoupled.
The maximum angle to which the player y-rot follows the camera y-rot. This config option only applies when player y-rot follows camera option is enabled.
${modId}.configuration.player.turning.wh: Turn player when using an item
Whether to turn the player when using an item. This config option only applies when camera is decoupled.
Whether to turn the player when attacking. This config option only applies when camera is decoupled.
Turn player when interacting with blocks
Whether to turn the player when interacting with blocks. This config option only applies when camera is decoupled.
Whether to turn the player when picking blocks or entities. This config option only applies when camera is decoupled.
${modId}.configuration.player.turning.tu: The time in ticks the player will remain turned after the interaction has ended. Set to 0 to disable. This config option only applies when camera is decoupled.
${modId}.configuration.object_picker.cus: The raytrace distance used for the dynamic crosshair.
${modId}.configuration.object_picker.use: Whether or not to use the custom raytrace distance used for the dynamic crosshair.
${modId}.configuration.object_picker.pic: The origin where the entity pick starts when using the static crosshair.
The origin where the block pick starts when using the static crosshair.
The vector direction of the raytrace when picking objects. This config option only applies when using the dynamic crosshair.
${modId}.configuration.crosshair.crossha: Crosshair type to use for shoulder surfing.
${modId}.configuration.crosshair.adaptiv: Items that when held, trigger the dynamic crosshair in adaptive mode. This config option supports regular expressions. Example: 'minecraft:.*sword' matches 'minecraft:wooden_sword' and 'minecraft:netherite_sword'.

Items that when used, trigger the dynamic crosshair in adaptive mode. This config option supports regular expressions. Example: 'minecraft:.*sword' matches 'minecraft:wooden_sword' and 'minecraft:netherite_sword'.
Item properties of an item, that when held, trigger the dynamic crosshair in adaptive mode.
Item properties of an item, that when used, trigger the dynamic crosshair in adaptive mode.
${modId}.configuration.obstruction.show_: When the crosshair type is static, shows an additional indicator on obstacles that stand between you and your target.
${modId}.configuration.obstruction.only_: Only show the obstruction indicator when using items that would trigger the adaptive crosshair.
${modId}.configuration.obstruction.min_d: Hide the obstruction indicator when it is too close to the main crosshair. Distance measured in scaled pixels.
${modId}.configuration.obstruction.max_d: Ignore obstructions that are too far away from the player. Distance measured in blocks. Set to 0 to disable.
${modId}.configuration.crosshair.visibil: Crosshair visibility for third person back.
${modId}.configuration.audio.center_play: Whether to center sounds made by the player.
